item.title: Asmongold Resigns from OTK and Starforge Systems Amid Twitch Ban
item.description: Asmongold steps down from OTK and Starforge Systems following controversial comments about the Israel-Hamas conflict.

item.title: Classic Weapons Make Their Way to Modern WoW During 20th Anniversary
item.description: Epic weapons from WoW Classic Season of Discovery are coming to modern WoW during the 20th-anniversary event.
